23.title: Reactjs + handlebars customization tool
23.description: Several changes to the front-end interface were implemented such as a multi-device menu and a tool for quoting products.

3.title: Reactjs order quotes system
3.description: A system was implemented to quote hp products by volume for offices, this included consumption of private stocks and customization of orders.

22.title: nodejs + angular  multi-language webapp
22.description: Improvements were made to the system that work with the management of leads and sale of spaces for franchise promotion across multiple languages and domains

13.title: nodejs+mysql+redis email manager
13.description: A mysql database massive mailbox administrator and sender system was implemented.

14.title: .net front-end modules improving consultancy
14.description: Several changes were implemented in a banking website to the modules written on. net as well as changes in the front-end.

24.title: Meteorjs learning system
24.description: Educational content management system for bootcamp students learning how to program, email and manage access.

12.title: Cordova prototipe for online classified ads company
12.description: A prototype of the online classifieds service was implemented where the private api of the clasificados.com site was consumed, before the actual native app was build.

11.title: Laravel New Autobytel to Autoweb api implementation
11.description: We implemented a rewriting of a system that managed to generate multiple mobile-web portals on the laravel framework for the autobytel.com to autoweb.com migration.

10.title: php mobile-web portal generator with helpdesk connection
10.description: Several changes were implemented to an application that managed multiple mobile sites and integrated calls to a helpdesk via SMS

9.title: php login with facebook javascript sdk
9.description: Implementation of a user login system with facebook accounts on the second largest video distribution platform in europe.

2.title: IOS PHP BACKEND
2.description: We implemented the login and creation of the json api to make fast food orders.

6.title: PHP INTEGRATION WITH SAP WEB SERVICES
6.description: An internal system interface was implemented over php that consumed apis of services provided by a sap implementation.

7.title: PHP ZEND FRAMEWORK service quotes modules

8.title: Javascript Front-end webiste
8.description: Javascript Front-end for a Reproductive campaign webiste

21.title: .net c# Documents Access and Management System (ADAMS)

1.title: Financial .Net C# end-user Modules
1.description:
Several financial modules were implemented for the use of financial clients where a user could consult information about the balance of their credit card, schedule recurring payments to public services and subscribe to new financial services by signing electronic contracts.

In addition to the generation of reports with SAP technology http://www.crystalreports.com/

15.title: NodeJs Sms event notificator
15.description: A notifier was scheduled to send SMS messages to system users advising them of credit card charges and other notifications.

19.title: Django QA manger webapp
19.description: We implemented a webapp that managed questions and answers for Spanish programmers in the stackoverflow style.

20.title: php without framework deals webapp

4.title: php crm reporting system
4.description: We implemented a module that generated pdf reports according to the auction company's specifications, such as invoices and bank related documents.

18.title: .NET directory profile listings and search module
18.description: We implemented a directory of profiles with specific information and a search engine widget with filters.

17.title: PHP E-comerce and social network module
17.description: Modules were implemented that loaded flash games and php modules for the socialengine.com and x-cart. com systems.

16.title: JS Front-end widget calculator
